HiddenText.Name: It seems like my/their Internet is too slow. What do we do?
HiddenText.OpenningText: It seems like my/their Internet is too slow. What do we do?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: In this situation, you may want to use audio only, rather than the video. If you need help doing this, see this page of tutorials from GCFlearnfree.org, and watch the video called “Making Calls with Skype.”
